ygData.subject: Damn nobody see we ate very weak ??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, I am level 24 so i now just pass the terrible 16-24 level (yeah at level 23 i was only using dd of level 16 sigh :( ).So i can deal 175 hp per cast...
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,
I am level 24 so i now just pass the terrible 16-24 level (yeah at level 23
i was only using dd of level 16 sigh :( ).So i can deal 175 hp per cast...
Wow... It really sucks.... I get others char on the server nearly same
level, and let me tell you friends, that the wizzard is the weakest class
of all Norrath. All classes get many lines of spell.. We don't...
We have :

1. Dd spel : our only power.
2. Ae spel : useless.. Never seen someone use it
3. Shield : same as all caster classes
4. Gate and evacuate : same as druid.. (evacuate work beters then gate ok ok
you get a point:) )
5. glimpse line : mouhhhaaa too funny :)
7. root : yeah as shaman and druid.... And i have been told that the root
level 39 immobilise doesn t work well...

and it s all... Nothing more.. So we get dd spel it s ALL.. That's so
boring... At level 24, a necro can :

1. summon a strong pet
2. Cast dot for 500 dommage for two bubble of mana...
3. Suck life of the mob...
4. Cast a dd of 145 dommage......
5. get a very good ac with spirit armor and invulnerability !!
6. Heal other
7. Cast fear who is LESS resisted then root and stay for a minimum of time


To be realist, we are a magician or necro without pet and shield.. Many tell
us : oh you can cast spel very fast !!! Yes and ??? It's the worste thing to
cast spel very fast.. Everyone know that in a group you must cast spel
veryyyy slowy or the mob will became crazy at you.
It helps in solo ? Heu every other caster get a pet, so casting time is not
important...

I don t think a petition will change anything. We are just a undepowered
class forever. I will continue to play with my wizzard for fun cause i like
rpg with him but that s all i know he will never been a powerful char.

My 2 cents

yakos on karana

p.s. oh and yes for the funny guys who say : we are the only one who can
solo a hills giant and so.. Guys a hills giant is green at level 40-42...
And for now, no one know about meteor shower (yes at level 50 you will use a
dd level 44, and yes the same as the druid use at level 49 :( )
